definition: roof tile/abbr. for 瓦特[wa3 te4]
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]
Kurt Waldheim (1918-2007), Austrian diplomat and politician, secretary-general of UN 1972-1981, president of Austria 1986-1992
pinyin: Ku4 er3 te4 · Wa3 er3 de2 hai3 mu3

sentences.english: Ewald and Weiss speak of the miracles of Christ as a daily task.
sentences.chinese: 埃瓦尔德和韦斯说的是基督的奇迹作为日常的任务。

sentences.english: Ferrero-Waldner agreed with Li's assessment of bilateral relations.
sentences.chinese: 瓦尔德纳赞同李肇星对中奥关系的评价。

sentences.english: Savard said the placebo effect in this case, though, is very real.
sentences.chinese: 萨瓦尔德博士称母乳其实也起了安慰剂的效果。

sentences.english: Waldheim devoted his most lifetime to politics.
sentences.chinese: 瓦尔德海姆一生大部分的时间从政。

sentences.english: Later they visited the remains of the Nazi death camp at Buchenwald .
sentences.chinese: 后来，他们访问了不累瓦尔德纳粹集中营遗址。

sentences.english: President Barack Obama toured Germany's Buchenwald concentration camp Friday.
sentences.chinese: 美国总统奥巴马周五参观了德国的布痕瓦尔德集中营。

sentences.english: Soviet foreign minister Eduard Shevardnadze is coming to Washington on Friday.
sentences.chinese: 苏联外长谢瓦尔德纳泽星期五来华盛顿。

sentences.english: Black cats tend to be adopted less often than other felines, Buchwald said.
sentences.chinese: 布什瓦尔德说黑猫本来就不容易被领养。

sentences.english: Lava flows from Mount Etna's Valle del Bove, on the island of Sicily.
sentences.chinese: 熔岩从西西里岛埃特纳火山的瓦尔德博韦流出。

sentences.english: Ms. Greenwald was attempting to make a left turn across four lanes of oncoming traffic.
sentences.chinese: 格林瓦尔德当时想要左拐并穿越迎面来车的四条车道。

sentences.english: Kong Linghui beat Waldner 5 to nil at the end of the first serving.
sentences.chinese: 孔令辉在第一次发球权结束时，以0领先瓦尔德内尔。

sentences.english: Samples of hand-made weapons made by Buchenwald prisoners.
sentences.chinese: 手样品由布痕瓦尔德集中营囚犯制造的武器。

sentences.english: I said, your Waldner table tennis played well.
sentences.chinese: 我说，你们的瓦尔德内尔乒乓球打得很好。

sentences.english: Later they visited the remains of the Nazi death camp at Buchenwald.
sentences.chinese: 之后他们参观了位于布痕瓦尔德的纳粹集中营遗址。

definition: Clark T. Randt Jr. (1945-), US ambassador to Beijing 2001-2009
